issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
Error occurs only on iOS.

*Test case*
{code:javascript}pickerSportOpen = true;
					wrapper = Ti.UI.createView({
					  backgroundColor: 'transparent',
					  height: 'auto',
					  width:'auto'
					});
					
					tView = Ti.UI.createView({
				        opacity:0.8,
				        width:'auto',
				        height:'auto',
				        backgroundColor:'#000000'
					});
					
					wrapper.add(tView);
					wrapper.add(pSportSaison);
					win.add(wrapper);{code}

*Error*
{code}
[ERROR] : The application has crashed with an uncaught exception 'NSRangeException'.
[ERROR] : Reason:
[ERROR] : *** -[__NSArrayM objectAtIndex:]: index 5 beyond bounds [0 .. 4]

fields.summary: iOS: Code working with Node.js v0.9.9 and Ti 3.0.2 but not with Node.js v0.10.13 and Ti 3.1.2

comments.body:
I have this error:

[moved to description]

Hi Chatis,

Please can you change your test case to be runnable in a brand new project so that we can reproduce the problem?

Clearly the workaround for now is to simply use an earlier version of Node.js (Titanium is most compatible with v0.8.22).

Thanks.

Hello,


I'll try but it's not so easy to reproduce the problem in a small part of the code... because it's now in a big project.. But i'll try...

That's what I'm doing.. Using v0.9.9... But this version isn't compatible with SDK 3.1.2 and my Android App need this SDK to be builded.... :-(
It's still not working and I can't reproduce a small test case... is it possible you try to see my all project to help me ? Thank you
